entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and 70 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres rising to 1500 metres in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
